description: This file is a React component named FlightSearch, implementing a flight search interface with input fields, a search button, and displaying search results. It interacts with an API via apiFetch to retrieve flight data and provides fallback mock data in case of errors.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs an API call to fetch flight data based on user inputs, updates results state, and handles errors with fallback data.

calls: apiFetch<Flight[]>('/flights/search', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({ from, to, departDate, returnDate }) })
